com.dff.sygic

Class SygicApiCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dff.sygic.SygicApiCallback

  • public class SygicApiCallback
extends java.lang.Object
    Callback for the sygic api. Listens to sygic api app events and fires them to the registered listener. Fires events when service is connected or disconnected.
    Author:
    dff solutions
